author: Anton Petrov
description:

Hello and welcome! My name is Anton and in this video, we will talk about dogs and why they exist
Links:
https://www.science.org/doi/epdf/10.1126/science.adt0995

#dogs #science #evolution 

0:00 Dogs and their evolution 
1:15 What we already knew - emotional bonds 
2:50 Didn't evolve from wolves and DNA 
3:20 How domestication (probably) happened 
4:30 Where did it start? 
6:00 American dogs 
7:25 Dietary adaptation compared to wolves 
8:20 Appearance
title: Bizarre Discoveries About Evolution of Dogs in the Last 50,000 Years
